description: Provides project-level details for your Amplify UI project.

nested_items.name: AmplifyFeatureFlags
nested_items.description: A stringified version of the cli.json file for your Amplify project.

nested_items.name: AmplifyMetaConfig
nested_items.description: A stringified version of the current configs for your Amplify project.

nested_items.name: BackendEnvironmentList
nested_items.description: A list of backend environments in an array.

nested_items.name: BackendEnvironmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the backend environment.

nested_items.name: Error
nested_items.description: If the request failed, this is the returned error.
